Reviews.Title: No Night Vision
Reviews.Author: WS Powell
Reviews.Content: Although this camera does provide a wide viewing range and audio, it has absolutely no night view capability.  If you want some night view capability, do not purchase this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD, High Resolution 600 TVL dome camera
Electronic Shutter, Dynamic noise reduction; Auto white balance control
0.002 Lux minimal illumination
Built-in 3.6 mm wide view angle lens
Package included: 1 of dome camera, 1 of power supply, 1 of audio video power extension cable, 1 of mini microphone and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Dome Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD High Resolution 600TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens for CCTV Home DVR Surveillance System with Bonus Power Supply, Audio Video Power Extension Cable and Preamp Microphone CB9
